simplycaterpillar.tutorial.drill_head.po: Click on power button to Turn On/Off
simplycaterpillar.options:
These are the options for each side
Mouse over them to see what they are
Click to toggle
Red = off
Green = on
simplycaterpillar.options2:
These are the blocks it will replace with
No block means it will leave it alone
and not replace it. you
must have the blocks in
the inventory of the drill
for it to place them
simplycaterpillar.selection:
The decoration places blocks in
a pattern that repeats every 10 blocks
0-9. Use the mouse wheel to Select which
section. The First scrollbar is where the drill
is at. The second scrollbar is which section
you have selected.
simplycaterpillar.selectionzero: click the tab again to select\nrow zero
simplycaterpillar.selectionpatter:
this view is from the 
back of the drill. you
must have the blocks in
the inventory of the drill
for it to place them
simplycaterpillar.buttonstorage: Use Buttons to change \nthe inventory page
